channel.title: Homes on Chandler Lutz
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Chandler Lutz

item.description: Biography Chandler Lutz is a professor of economics at Copenhagen Business School. His research interests include housing economics, financial economics, macroeconomics and monetary policy.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Advanced Financial Econometrics (Time Series, PhD level), 2011 - Present. - Average Overall Evaluation: 4.45 / 5.00 Applied Econometrics (Cross-Section and Time Series, MBA level), 2011 - Present. - Average Overall Evaluation: 4.60 / 5.00 Teaching Awards: Best Teacher Award, CBS, Applied Econ and Finance, 2013-2014. Best Teacher Award, CBS, Applied Econ and Finance, 2014-2015. Best Teacher Award, CBS, Applied Econ and Finance, 2015-2016. Best Teacher Award, CBS, Applied Econ and Finance, 2016-2017.
